short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Shows who all liked your tweet in one click. For others' tweets, only reposts are shown

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Click on the 'Post time' (e.g. "Jan 18" or "8h") of a tweet. This will open the 'Post engagements' page where you get to see the likes (only if it is your own tweet), reposts and quotes for the tweet.
